org.openscience.cdk.libio.cml

Class QSARCustomizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.libio.cml.QSARCustomizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICMLCustomizer

    public class QSARCustomizer
extends Object
implements ICMLCustomizer
    Customizer for the libio-cml Convertor to be able to export details for QSAR descriptors calculated for Molecules.
    Author:
    egonw
    Belongs to the set:
    libio-cml-customizers
    Created on:
    2005-05-04
    Requires:
    java1.5+
    Belongs to CDK module:
    qsarcml
    Source code:
